::: Within hours, the shaby cave was transformed in a modern base suitable 
even for the original Megatron. :::

::: He glanced over the area. Cr chambers, computers, lights, and troops. 
Just what he needed. :::

::: Megatron ::: This is excellent, yes. We are now officially independent!

::: Waspinator, in his beast mode lugging around crates and boxes, ::: Yes 
Megatron, we will destroy the Ark!

::: Megatron ::: Yes, in time.

~~~~~~~~`

::: Set hit Gremlin in his shoulder, but what sent flying across the room 
after Pheniox lept into the cannon and fired at him. Ra sent a stream of fire 
at Transanulas, who caused a few rocks to crash on him. After a few minutes, 
the fire stoped and everything was quiet. :::

::: Ominous ::: Set, this was a bad idea. We should have planned this better!

::: Set ::: No, we need that tower, once we get it we can use it agianst them.

::: Ra ::: Even so, master, we are out numbered.

::: Across on the other side of the cave....:::

::: Marine ::: I will take Set, Transanulas you take Ra, Gremlin take 
Ominous, and Pheniox cover us!

::: They lept up and ran firing at the threesome who was caught off gaurd. 
They fired, but it had little damage. Set, Ra, and Ominous fled down the 
tunnle the entered in. :::

::: Marine, leaning over the hole ::: Ah! Victory is ours!

::: He fired a single missle down after, caving it in on them :::

::: Gremlin ::: Now, I suggest we call Hell Beast.

~~~~~~~~

::: Rampage joined the circle surrounding the invaders ::: Ah, he has fear, I 
can smell it. It makes my senses alive...my mouth water.
